title: How the Tortoise Became Fast:  A Fable to Follow to Achieve Your Goals
description: The tortoise didn't beat the hare in the race by simply wishing for it - he took action!Now, the prequel to Aesop's Fable can finally be told."How the Tortoise Became Fast" is a short, but motivating, book that doesn't try to tell you what you should be striving for. You need to make those decisions yourself.But, if you follow the tortoise's six step goal setting plan, you might just discover the "how" to reach them.Everything you need is included in this book: the story, insights, activities, and worksheets.Join the tortoise and take the first step towards achieving your goals!  10% of all proceeds will be given to the Paralyzed Veterans of America to help support the National Veterans Wheelchair Games.See the back cover photo for more about the book!Paperback available at www.tinyurl.com/tortoisegoalsebook available at Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Smashwords
author: Nathan Mercer
